title: Microsoft Office 2016 for Seniors For Dummies {{ERTB}}
description:

Keep up with the latest Office technologies, and learn the fundamentals of Microsoft Office 2016! Larger font and image sizes mean you can easily read the content and text that gets back to basics walks you through everything you need to know to use these programs in a variety of environments.



Whether you want to improve your Microsoft Office skills to stay competitive at work or to finally write that novel youâ€²ve had simmering in your head for the last ten years, this is the resource you need to get started!
